dataList.title: 布隆-布隆
dataList.desc: The ride is awkward and intimidating. Even though I’ve been handed the title of ‘Manager’, I have no idea what to do at a time like this. I decided to ask the Sinner with a bug’s arm where we’re currently headed.

dataList.title: 舞蹈时间
dataList.desc: After being “asked” a favor I couldn’t turn down, I was forced to bear a series of pains worse than death rewinding the clock. The bus fell quiet in a less-than-pleasant way, and I kept my mouth shut. Let’s hope nothing else happens until we reach District 4…

dataList.title: 巴士甲板
dataList.desc: A band of thugs attacks us, trying to take the bus. For some reason, we leave them barely breathing instead of killing them outright, placing them in front of Mephistopheles…

dataList.title: 脑啡肽
dataList.desc: We watched Mephistopheles as it consumed the corpses, its maw looking more reliable than the Sinners. I knew something was up from the moment I saw this bus for the first time, but what is this thing exactly? Faust seems to have something to say.

dataList.title: 尤莉
dataList.desc: When the bus had just about finished its “meal”, Vergilius shouted to me that we’re expecting a guest. I’m curious to see who’d be joining us on this less-than-pleasant trip.

dataList.title: 地图
dataList.desc: Our guest was a Fixer named Yuri, a former employee of Lobotomy Corporation. Seeing as she showed an indifferent response to the bus devouring bodies, she must’ve gone through a lot herself. But then she grows nervous as she checks the map and looks at the driver’s seat…

dataList.title: 三人组
dataList.desc: I was shocked to learn that… Charon has virtually no sense of direction. Though, I guess it’s fortunate that it’s come to light this early into the trip. Yuri took matters into her own hands and started teaching her how to read a map, and Sinclair joined, too. They’re rather noisy, but still… I can’t say that I hate to see it.

dataList.title: 害虫
dataList.desc: Rodya looks out through the window at the Backstreets before flinching abruptly. Her eyes fell on a group of people with the heads of bugs. Then, Gregor’s expression shifted as well. It was not out of flinching disgust like Rodya, though.

dataList.title: 向导
dataList.desc: After a number of scuffles and scrapes, we arrived at an old Lobotomy Corporation branch. Near the entrance, new faces were waiting for us…

dataList.title: 8阶收尾人
dataList.desc: Just before we entered the LC branch facility, Vergilius stopped me all of a sudden. It seems he has something to say to me alone.

dataList.title: D-02支部
dataList.desc: We descended into a fetid underground facility. The place was lined with corpses and critters. Just what happened here? And can we come back in one piece with the Golden Bough in our hands?
